ComicInfo.Summary: Ellis and Wolfer continue Volume Three "The Last King Of England": no-one's comfortable with the king of the magicians being a British soldier who really just wants to be left alone with a bit of extra beer money in his pocket. Now, the forces of the establishment begin to surround the problem of William Gravel, in "A Very British Coup." It's never a dull day being Combat Magician William Gravel. This issue is available with a regular or wraparound cover by Mike Wolfer.

ComicInfo.Title: A Very British Coup
